condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, schools and communities of the most vulnerable areas to disasters strengthened their resilience capacities.

description.narrative: UNICEF Cuba supports the spread of best practices in disaster risk reduction from the school and identifies the needs to increase risk perception in communities exposed to multiple risks. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2020

title.narrative: Nmero de docentes miembros de las brigadas pedaggicas de respuesta a sismos, capacitados.
Elaborada la gua de preparacin a la familia en casos de sismos.
Nmero de centros educativos afectados por el huracn Irma en Camaguey, rehabilitados.
Nmero de crculos infantiles recostruidos y puestos en funcionamiento.
Percentage of schools with updated risk maps and evacuation plans, to respond to natural, technological and health disasters.
Percentage of teachers and school directors prepared to transmit their knowledge for the protection of the environment and disaster risk reduction in vulnerable areas.
Percentage of children and adolescents that improve and use their knowledge for the protection of the environment and disaster risk reduction.
Fondos movilizados por el Comit de Gran Bretaa en apoyo a la emergencia en el rea de educacin recibidos, planificados e implementados.

baseline.value: Fondos comprometidos para apoyo en la carpintera de escuelas en Baracoa.

actual.value: 2018:Fondos implementados en apoyo a la rehabilitación de la carpintería de 22 escuelas del municipio Baracoa y facilidadees sanitarias en 77 escuelas de los municipios Baracoa y Maisí
